cn.loginErrorMessage: 登入失败，请确认您的输入资料和类型。
cn.serviceFailed: 发生了一些问题，请联系管理员。
cn.tooManyRequests: 请求太频繁，请稍后再试。

en.loginErrorMessage: Login failed, please confirm your input data and type.
en.serviceFailed: Some problems have occurred, please contact the administrator.
en.timeout: Result is too large to display. Please adjust search parameters.
